title: @Riot lvl up keybindings
body:
I want to have my setting as tab+q or tab+w lvls up your skill instead of reaching all the way down to ctrl if anyone can help with the settings this would be of great help. I tried going into the files but whenever I would press tab it would lvl up a random spell instead of letting me press tab then corresponding spell to lvl it up.

If this isnt implemented in the current client I hope this is resolved in the next because I am put at a very high disadvantage compared to higher elo players when this happens

replies.body:
The new client actually doesn't change anything you see past champ select as far as I know. Unfortunately, some hotkeys (such as the TAB or Windows key) aren't able to be bound to certain actions, and I cannot assist you in making manual modifications to your files.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Well thanks for the help and information if you can please pass this up to someone of higher influence to help this get address in possibly a future update this would help me so much that I could easily hit plat with a change like this.
